mapper.insert: insert into tbl_story_comment(st_c_no, user_id, st_no, st_c_content, st_c_parent_no, st_c_order) values (seq_story_c_no.nextval, #{user_id}, #{st_no}, #{st_c_content}, seq_story_c_no.nextval, seq_story_c_no.nextval)
mapper.select: select sc.*, mb.user_nick from tbl_story_comment sc, tbl_memberdetail mb where sc.user_id = mb.user_id and st_no = #{st_no} and is_del = 'N'
mapper.update: update tbl_story_comment set st_c_content = #{st_c_content}, mod_date = sysdate where st_c_no = #{st_c_no}
update tbl_story_comment set is_del = 'Y', del_date = sysdate where st_c_no = #{st_c_no}
mapper.select: select st_c_count from tbl_story where st_no = #{st_no}
